description:
A large heavy shield, made out of a bulette head plate.
Not much has been done to process the plate besides sanding and nailing a few leather straps to it.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 3 layers of stone, 2 layers of heavy bone

description:
A medium sized heavy shield, made out of a bulette head plate.
Some of the stony bone has been sanded down and the sides have been broken off into jagged edges that look like they would hurt.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 3 layers of stone, 2 layers of heavy bone

description:
A decievingly heavy yet small shield, made out of a bulette head plate.
Most of the stony bone has been sanded down and the sides have been rounded , with jagged edges that look like they would hurt.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 3 layers of stone, 2 layers of heavy bone

description:
A large hefty shield, made out of a bulette head plate. Much of the heavy stone layer has been filed down, revealing the bone plate beneath, and superalloy plates have been welded into it to improve weight distribution without sacrificing defense.
Despite its lessened weight, it is far too big and awkward to properly use a two-handed weapon with.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 3 layers of superalloy, 2 layers of heavy bone

description:
A medium sized hefty shield, made out of a bulette head plate. Much of the heavy stone layer has been filed down, revealing the bone plate beneath, and superalloy plates have been welded into it to improve weight distribution without sacrificing defense.
With a better weight distribution, and by carving out a groove on the side, this shield can be used with two-handed weapons - although, it's still a bit awkward.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 3 layers of superalloy, 2 layers of heavy bone

description:
A heafty yet small shield, made out of a bulette head plate. Much of the heavy stone layer has been filed down, revealing the bone plate beneath, and superalloy plates have been welded into it to improve weight distribution without sacrificing defense.
The round design ,with a much lighter weight, makes this the perfect tool for parrying, while also being able to protect oneself from danger.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 3 layers of superalloy, 2 layers of heavy bone

description:
A large hefty shield, made out of a bulette head plate. Much of the heavy stone layer has been filed down, superalloy plates have been welded into it, and further reinforced with orichalcum.
The design has been further improved, and looks more like a proper shield than a bone plate. It shimmers with magical potential.
The image of an eye has been carved out in its center, and a bulette pearl has been used as the iris - it casts a terrifying gaze.
//: calc logic: 2 layers of orichalcum, 2 layers of superalloy, 2 layers of heavy bone
